document.full_text: the united states is studying ways to support egypt's economy following hosni mubarak's overthrow, the u.s. embassy said on monday after a u.s. newspaper said washington had decided to provide $1 billion in debt relief.
document.title: u.s. eyes ways to support battered egypt economy
lines_and_colors: the united states is studying ways to support egypt's economy following hosni mubarak's overthrow, the u.s. embassy said on monday after a u.s. newspaper said washington had decided to provide $1 billion in debt relief.
